---
title: "About JENGA"
---

Jenga is an outreach project aiming at sensitizing children about the importance of inter-relationships in nature. It is lead by Sonia Kéfi (CNRS, Institut des Sciences de l'Evolution de Montpellier, France; Santa Fe Institute, Santa Fe, NM, USA) and Vincent Miele (CNRS, Laboratoire de Biométrie et Biologie, Lyon, France).
